titleStmt.title: The practise of repentance laid downe in sundry directions, together with the helpes, lets, signes and motiues. In an easie method, according to the table prefixed. As it was preached in Aldermanbury by Thomas Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by H. Lownes] for J. Bartlet at the gilt Cup in Cheapeside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
